summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5694 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Magnolia Terrace Addition and in Block 6, Buena Vista Addition No. 2, being the alley between 28th Avenue West and 29th Avenue West from West Armour Street to West Barrett Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75288, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
